title: Ni-based catalysts supported on Hbeta zeolite for the hydrocracking of waste polyolefins
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15856-15861
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02809K, Paper

Guoqing Zhang, Qingguo Mao, Yiqun Yue, Ruitong Gao, Yajing Duan, Hui Du
High efficiency hydrocracking degradation of mixed polyolefin polymers is achieved under mild circumstances by Ni-based catalysts supported on Hbeta.
